quotes.quote: You must never forget that greatness does not guarantee happiness but goodness always does.
As we express our gratitude, we must never forget that the highest appreciation is not to utter words, but to live by them.
Never forget that only dead fish swim with the stream.
Never forget the power of silence, that massively disconcerting pause which goes on and on and may at last induce an opponent to babble and backtrack nervously.
We forget all too soon the things we thought we could never forget.
Never forget posterity when devising a policy. Never think of posterity when making a speech.
Never forget what a person says to you when they are angry.
Never forget that the key to the situation lies in the will and not in the imagination.
We never forget those who make us blush.
Never forget: We are alive within mysteries.
Never forget that all you have is all you need.
People will never forget how you made them feel.
Never forget to see the beauty, even in ugliness.
One never forgets faces one wholeheartedly detests.
Never forget that justice is what love looks like in public
Never forget the importance of living with unbridled exhilaration.
Never forget what you learned in the light when you are in the dark.
Let us never forget that what we are is more important than what we do.
Never forget that if you leave your law to judges and your religion to bishops, you will presently find yourself without either law or religion.
Never forget that when we are silent, we are one. And when we speak we are two.
Never forget the morals instilled in you and what really matters in Life. Never let other voices of other people drown out your inner voice.
Never forget that God tests his real friends more severely than the lukewarm ones.
Never forget: the secret of creating riches for oneself is to create them for others.
Never forget that the most important thing in life is the quality of life we lead.
I'll never forget where I'm from. It's essential to remain humble and evolving.
Never forget that what becomes timeless was once truly new.
Never forget that the most political thing you can ever do is follow your heart.
Never forget that the most powerful force on earth is love.
One must never forget that life is unfair. But sometimes, with a bit of luck, this works in your favour.
Never forget that no military leader has ever become great without audacity.
